dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images of 28x28 pixel grayscale images of digits from 0 to 9.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:creator: S. Zhang
A. Choromanska

dcterms:description: A dataset containing video clips of various actions performed by people, annotated with keypoints for human pose estimation.
dcterms:title: Penn Action Dataset
